title: Is anybody here preparing for UPSC IAS 2021? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Yes I am going to give my UPSC CSE exams in 2021.Right now i am doing my Graduation with B.com.I am in first year of my Bcom .So i have abundant of time to cover up my preparations.I have decided to do self study rather taking coaching. Till now i have invested my time in understanding the pattern of UPSC Examinations.I have gone through the whole syllabus and trid to understand and memorize it.I have decided my Optionals,i.e Sociology. Stategy in coming years From next year i will start reading basic NCERTS.I will try to finish it within 6 monts.After that i will prepare my optionals because my optionals would not be my Graduation subject so it requires more attention.Optionals will take minimum 6 monts.Then i will start with my Mains preparations. I will devote maximum time to mains.I will prepare Mains Firstly because it is very vast area which covers most of the topic of Prelims.If my mains will be prepared then i can easliy prepare Prelims.Once i have done with Mains i will start Prelims.After completing Prelims i will once again start revision from beginning.In between i will do my Essay preparations also.If everything goes well i will appear for UPSC CSE Examinations.

Nothing is permanent not even this Coronavirus. When lockdown will lift up the normalcy is likely to be return on track. The recruitment cycle would begin, And believe me it the best time to prepare for the examination. Though it is challenging time but a good time for study and best time for UPSC IAS. My young brother is looking for UPSC preparation for 2021. Many of my senior including me suggest him to enrolled in KSG IAS. As it is the best and top most institute. The KOL is a online dedicated platform of KSG intent to deliver the offline quality of KSG , now online. Amid COVID, I think it is prudent to join online classroom coaching. Dr. khan sir is a great personality and have successfully guided more than thousands of thousands aspirant. His guidance and aspirant handwork would transformed into sure success. The result of KSG tells about the feature and quality of the institute. That why i insist him to take admission in KSG.
